languages.text: "Не могу выразить, как я благодарен вам за помощь. Теперь, когда замыслы вероломных еретиков пошли прахом, ничто не мешает ни моим, ни вашим планам. Со смертью Зари мятежные настроения пошли на спад, бунтовщики сдаются целыми отрядами. Восстание доживает последние дни. Я уже издал указ о выделении вам двух тысяч первоклассных матросов — вот-вот начнется их перевозка на ваш корабль".

traits.locale_text: "Не могу выразить, как я благодарен вам за помощь. Теперь, когда замыслы вероломных еретиков пошли прахом, ничто не мешает ни моим, ни вашим планам. Со смертью Зари мятежные настроения пошли на спад, бунтовщики сдаются целыми отрядами. Восстание доживает последние дни. Я уже издал указ о выделении вам двух тысяч первоклассных матросов — вот-вот начнется их перевозка на ваш корабль".

languages.text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."
languages.original_text: "Не могу выразить, как я благодарен вам за помощь. Теперь, когда замыслы вероломных еретиков пошли прахом, ничто не мешает ни моим, ни вашим планам. Со смертью Зари мятежные настроения пошли на спад, бунтовщики сдаются целыми отрядами. Восстание доживает последние дни. Я уже издал указ о выделении вам двух тысяч первоклассных матросов — вот-вот начнется их перевозка на ваш корабль".

traits.locale_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your assistance. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been utterly frustrated, nothing's standing in the way of my plans or of yours. With Aurora dead, support for the insurgency is waning. Entire squads of rebels have surrendered. We're seeing the final days of the uprising. I've already signed the order to give you two thousand first-rate voidfarers. Their transfer to your ship will begin any minute now."

"I can't express how grateful I am for your assistance. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been utterly frustrated, nothing's standing in the way of my plans or of yours. With Aurora dead, support for the insurgency is waning. Entire squads of rebels have surrendered. We're seeing the final days of the uprising. I've already signed the order to give you two thousand first-rate voidfarers. Their transfer to your ship will begin any minute now."

"I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been spoiled, nothing's standing in the way of my plans nor yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We're seeing the final days of the uprising. I've already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

"I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been spoiled, nothing's standing in the way of my plans nor yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We're seeing the final days of the uprising. I've already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

"I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

"I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

languages.text: "Ich kann gar nicht sagen, wie dankbar ich für Eure Hilfe bin. Nun, da die Pläne der heimtückischen Ketzer vereitelt wurden, steht den meinen und den Euren nichts mehr im Wege. Aurora ist tot, der Geist der Rebellion schwindet. Ganze Trupps von Rebellen ergeben sich. Wir erleben die letzten Tage des Aufstands. Ich habe bereits den Befehl unterzeichnet, Euch zweitausend erstklassige Raumfahrer zuzuweisen. Ihr Transfer auf Euer Schiff sollte jeden Augenblick beginnen."
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann gar nicht sagen, wie dankbar ich für Eure Hilfe bin. Nun, da die Pläne der heimtückischen Ketzter vereitelt wurden, steht den meinen und den Euren nichts mehr im Wege. Aurora ist tot, der Geist der Rebellion schwindet. Ganze Trupps von Rebellen ergeben sich. Wir erleben die letzten Tage des Aufstands. Ich habe bereits den Befehl unterzeichnet, Euch zweitausend erstklassige Raumfahrer zuzuweisen. Ihr Transfer auf Euer Schiff sollte jeden Augenblick beginnen."

languages.text: « Je ne sais comment vous exprimer toute ma gratitude pour votre aide. Maintenant que les plans de ces insidieux hérétiques sont tombés à l'eau, plus rien ne s'oppose à mes projets ou aux vôtres. Avec la mort d'Aurore, l'esprit de révolte s'éteint. Des escouades entières de rebelles se rendent. L'insurrection vit ses derniers jours. J'ai déjà signé l'ordre de vous allouer deux milles voyageurs stellaires de première classe. Leur transfert à bord de votre vaisseau devrait commencer d'une minute à l'autre. »
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais comment vous exprimer toute ma gratitude pour votre aide. Maintenant que les plans de ces insidieux hérétiques sont tombés à l'eau, plus rien ne s'oppose à mes projets ou aux vôtres. Avec la mort d'Aurore, l'esprit de révolte s'éteint. Des escouades entières de rebelles se rendent. L'insurrection vit ses derniers jours. J'ai déjà signé l'ordre de vous allouer deux milles voyageurs stellaires de première classe. Leur transfert à bord de votre vaisseau devrait commencer d'une minute à l'autre. »

languages.text: “我无法用言语表达我对您的感激。既然那些异端分子的阴谋已经破产，那我和您之前商定的安排就能顺利进行了。‘极光’一死，叛军的士气一蹶不振，大批大批叛军开始投降。看得出来，这场叛乱已经坚持不了几天了。我已经签署了命令，为您分配了两千名一级船员，他们很快就会登上您的舰船。”
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: “我无法用言语表达我对您的感激。既然那些异端分子的阴谋已经破产，那我和您之前商定的安排就能顺利进行了。‘极光’一死，叛军的士气一蹶不振，大批大批叛军开始投降。看得出来，这场叛乱已经坚持不了几天了。我已经签署了命令，为您分配了两千名一级船员，他们很快就会登上您的舰船。”

languages.text: 「あなた方のご協力に、言葉で言い表せないほど感謝している。陰湿な異端者達の計画が台無しになった今、私やあなた方の計画を邪魔するものは何もない。オーロラが死んで、反乱に対する気持ちは勢いをなくした。反乱軍の全隊が降伏している。反乱が終わる時を目の当たりにしているな。2,000名の優秀な虚空渡りをあなたにあてがう命令書にサインしたよ。すぐにでもそちらの船へ移動を開始するだろう」
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: 「あなた方のご協力に、言葉で言い表せないほど感謝している。陰湿な異端者達の計画が台無しになった今、私やあなた方の計画を邪魔するものは何もない。オーロラが死んで、反乱に対する気持ちは勢いをなくした。反乱軍の全隊が降伏している。反乱が終わる時を目の当たりにしているな。2,000名の優秀な虚空渡りをあなたにあてがう命令書にサインしたよ。すぐにでもそちらの船へ移動を開始するだろう」

languages.text: «No puedo expresar lo que agradezco su ayuda. Ahora que los insidiosos designios de los herejes se han frustrado, nada se opone a mis planes ni a los suyos. Con Aurora muerta, el espíritu de la revuelta decae. Escuadrones enteros de rebeldes se están rindiendo. Estamos presenciando los últimos días de la insurrección. Ya he firmado la orden de asignarle a dos mil viajeros del vacío de primera clase. Su traslado a su nave debería comenzar en cualquier momento».
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: «No puedo expresar lo que agradezco su ayuda. Ahora que los insidiosos designios de los herejes se han frustrado, nada se opone a mis planes ni a los suyos. Con Aurora muerta, el espíritu de la revuelta decae. Escuadrones enteros de rebeldes se están rindiendo. Estamos viendo los últimos días de la insurrección. Ya he firmado la orden de asignarle dos mil viajeros del vacío de primera clase. Su traslado a su nave debería comenzar en cualquier momento».

languages.text: "Yardımınız için duyduğum minneti kelimelere dökemem. O sinsi kâfirlerin tertiplerini bozduğunuza göre, ne benim ne de sizin planlarınızı engelleyecek bir şey kalmadı. Aurora'nın ölümüyle insanlardaki isyan ateşi söndü. İsyancıların koca koca mangaları teslim oluyor. Ayaklanmanın son günlerine tanık oluyoruz. Şimdiden size iki bin adet birinci sınıf gemici tahsis edilmesi emrini imzaladım. Geminize nakilleri her an başlayabilir."
languages.original_text: "I can't express how grateful I am for your help. Now that the insidious heretics' designs have been thwarted, nothing stands in the way of my plans or yours. With Aurora dead, the spirit of revolt is waning. Entire squads of rebels are surrendering. We are witnessing the final days of the uprising. I have already signed the order to allocate two thousand first-class voidfarers to you. Their transfer to your ship should begin any minute now."

traits.locale_text: "Yardımınız için duyduğum minneti kelimelere dökemem. O sinsi kâfirlerin tertiplerini bozduğunuza göre, ne benim ne de sizin planlarınızı engelleyecek bir şey kalmadı. Aurora'nın ölümüyle insanlardaki isyan ateşi söndü. İsyancıların koca koca mangaları teslim oluyor. Ayaklanmanın son günlerine tanık oluyoruz. Şimdiden size iki bin adet birinci sınıf gemici tahsis edilmesi emrini imzaladım. Geminize nakilleri her an başlayabilir."
